    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static ResourceMonitor getInstance()

      • getSystemCpuLoad

        public double getSystemCpuLoad()
        The function reports the current total CPU usage.
        Returns:
        current total CPU load. The value is between 0 and 100. 0 means that the system is completely idle whereas 100 indicates that the system is busy.

      • getFreePhysicalMemorySize

        public long getFreePhysicalMemorySize()
        The function reports the free amount of physical memory in MB.
        Returns:
        free amount of physical memory in MB.

      • getNumberOfCPUCores

        public int getNumberOfCPUCores()
        The function reports the total number of cores in the system.
        Returns:
        total number of cores in the system.

      • getSystemGpuLoad

        public int getSystemGpuLoad()
        The function reports the current total GPU usage.
        Returns:
        current total GPU load. The value is between 0 and 100. 0 means that the GPU is completely idle whereas 100 indicates that the GPU is busy.
